snippet: In an age when it’s possible to outsource the entire wedding, some couples are forging bonds while forging their own gold to create D.I.Y. wedding bands.
abstract: San Diego-based company Wedding Ring Experience offers daylong workshops that teach couples how to forge their own gold wedding bands to create an authentic, and physical, bond for their big day.
lead_paragraph: In an age when it’s possible to outsource the entire wedding, some couples are forging bonds while forging their own gold to create D.I.Y. wedding bands.

headline.seo: With This Torch, I Thee Weld a Ring — Field Notes
headline.main: With This Torch, I Thee Weld
headline.print_headline: With This Torch, I Thee Weld
